Docs.summary: Gets or sets the width of this structure.

remarks.para: Changing the property will also cause a change in the property of the . The units the rectangle is drawn in is determined by the P:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit and P:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale properties of the graphics object used for drawing. The default unit is pixels.

remarks.para: Changing the property will also cause a change in the property of the . The units the rectangle is drawn in is determined by the P:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit and P:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale properties of the graphics object used for drawing. The default unit is pixels.
